Verify the carousel indicator dots are circular in shape, each has width 8px, height 8px, background color #cccccc, 50% border radius, margin 0 4px, and opacity 0.8
Verify the active carousel indicator dot changes to background color #007bff
Verify there is a total count of 5 carousel indicator dots

Verify the 'Delete' button displays text 'Delete', has background color #efefef, text color #6c757d, border 1px solid #dee2e6, opacity 0.6, is disabled, has width 100px, height 38px, padding 8px 16px, font weight 400, and aria-label 'Permanently delete item'
Verify the 'Buy Now' button displays exact text 'Buy Now' with font size 18px and foreground color #FFFFFF
Verify its background color is rgb(255,100,0), it has 2px solid #FF5000 border, 8px corner curvature, is enabled, not hidden, positioned at x 100 and y 250 with width 180px and height 50px
Verify on hover, its background transitions to rgb(200,80,0) over 300ms, and its aria-label is 'Add product to cart'

Verify the 'Products' navigation link has font family 'Roboto', font size 16px, font weight 500, foreground color #333333, inner spacing 10px 15px, is visible, aligned to the left within the header, has external margin 0px 20px, horizontal position 200px, and vertical position 20px
Verify when the 'Products' navigation link is in the focused state, its background color is #F0F0F0 and its border bottom is 2px solid #007bff
Open 'https://www.example.com/homepage'

Verify the main hero image has source 'hero_banner.jpg', rendered dimensions 1200x400px, natural dimensions 2400x800px, alt text contains 'Homepage promotional banner', is loaded within 500ms, centered horizontally, has opacity 1, and no watermark

Verify the 'Search' input field placeholder text is 'Enter product name...', its current value is empty, has 1px solid #CCCCCC border, 4px corner curvature, width 250px, height 40px, is enabled, visible, has padding 8px 10px, and aria-label 'Search field'
Verify when the 'Search' input field is in the focused state, its border color becomes #007bff
Verify the video player controls are visible
Verify the 'Mute' button shows the sound off state and its icon color is #FFFFFF
Verify the video is not in full screen mode initially
Verify the player's width is 640px and height is 360px
Verify the video element has source 'video_promo.mp4' and is loaded
Verify the play button is enabled and its background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Click 'Open Modal'
Verify the modal dialog becomes visible
Verify its background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.7) for the overlay and #FFFFFF for the content box
Verify the content box has 12px corner curvature, 1px solid #DDDDDD border, opacity 1, is centered horizontally and vertically, with width 500px and height 300px
Verify the 'Close' button is positioned at its top right, 10px from the edge
Inspect the product table displaying inventory data
Verify the 'Product Name' column text is left justified and 'Quantity' column text is right justified
Verify all product names use font family 'Arial', font size 14px, and foreground color #333333
Verify the table contains exactly 5 rows of data
Verify the table border is 1px solid #EEEEEE and each cell padding is 12px
Verify the '3' page item in the pagination component is in the active state with background color #007bff and foreground color #FFFFFF
Verify non-active pagination items have background color #E9ECEF and foreground color #007bff
Verify each pagination item has 1px solid #DDDDDD border, padding 8px 12px, and external margin 0px 4px
Verify there are 7 pagination items displayed
Click the 'Language Selector'
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned with its top edge aligned to the bottom of the selector and its left edge aligned
Verify its width is 150px and height is 200px
Verify the list contains exactly 5 language options
Verify each option's font size is 14px and text color is #333333
Verify the dropdown has a border of 1px solid #CCCCCC
Check the 'Success' notification banner when a new message appears
Verify the banner has background color #D4EDDA, foreground color #155724, and 6px corner curvature
Verify its inner spacing is 15px 20px
Verify its opacity is 1, and it undergoes a fade-in animation duration of 300ms
Verify the displayed string is 'Item added successfully!'
Verify it is positioned at the top of the viewport with a fixed position
Verify the 'Previous' navigation arrow is disabled if it's the first image, with opacity 0.5 and foreground color #AAAAAA
Verify both navigation arrows, when enabled, have foreground color #FFFFFF and background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Verify each navigation arrow is 40px wide, 40px high, has 50% border radius, is vertically centered, and positioned 10px from the left and right edges respectively

Verify the selected date '2023-10-26' is highlighted with background color #007bff and foreground color #FFFFFF
Verify the text size for dates is 14px
Verify the picker has a border of 1px solid #CCCCCC and a width of 280px
Verify today's date has a border of 1px solid #FFA500 and is enabled

Verify the user avatar image has source 'user_profile.jpg', rounded shape with 50% border radius, rendered dimensions 60x60px, alt text 'User profile picture', is loaded, centered within its container, has 2px solid #007bff border, no watermark, and its top position is 10px from its parent
Observe the loading progress bar

Verify the filled portion has background color #28A745, and the remaining portion #E9ECEF

Verify its animation smoothly updates over 400ms
Verify the bar's height is 16px, it has 4px corner curvature, and its left position is 0

Verify it is positioned 10px below and horizontally centered relative to the 'Info' icon
